snippet: The Center for Copyright Information names an executive director and four board members to oversee its "six strikes" plan for controlling online piracy; Bono and the Edge of U2 invest in Dropbox.
abstract: The Center for Copyright Information names an executive director and four board members to oversee its "six strikes" plan for controlling online piracy; Bono and the Edge of U2 invest in Dropbox.

headline.main: Digital Notes: A Boss for 'Six Strikes' Copyright Enforcement
